#summary All available PINF commands

= Introduction =

The _pinf_ command line tool provides a single point of access to your entire PHP toolchain. All commands are exposed via the Zend_Tool_Framework to any number of clients.

= Third party wrappers =

{{{
pinf pear *
pinf phing *
pinf zf *
}}}

See: [PEAR], [Phing], [ZendFramework]

= PINF commands =

{{{
pinf show version
}}}
